indications: Itching from a variety of rashes due to Wind

contraindications: Contraindicated for internal use when there are fully erupted measles.
Contraindicated for those with Deficiency with profuse sweating.
Contraindicated for those with Deficiency with Heat Rising.
Use caution when using with children under age 18. Too large a dose can deplete Heart function and the patient can easily become fretful and annoyed.

useCases: Wind-Cold Obstructing the Exterior and leading to Internal sinking of rash toxin

notes: The action of this herb is concentrated on venting not cooling.
